features: 🍽【24 PIECES BLACK SILVERWARE SET FOR 4】: This flatware set contains 4 dinner forks, 4 salad forks, 4 dinner spoons, 4 dessert spoons, 4 dinner knives and 4 steak knives. Great for home, restaurant, hotel, buffet, gathering, wedding, camping, party and entertaining. If you are going to have a picnic or a party , then this set of tableware can not only meet your requirements, but also make your dinner full of design.

🍽【HIGH QUALITY AND DURABLE】: This silverware set is made of FOOD GRADE stainless steel which is very durable, corrosion resistant, rust-proof, non-toxic, BPA free, no metal aftertaste. Meanwhile, its sturdiness ensures that it will not bend easily providing you with long - term use.

🍽【UNIQUE BLACK LOOK】: The mysterious black appearance stands out from ordinary silverware, making it look more retro and vintage, just like a noble flatware used in the manor, smooth surface and fine workmanship make it more luxurious and create an elegant, noble and luxurious dining atmosphere. There is no need to worry about fading or cracking, as this is a metal layer from vacuum plating technology. If you want to be different in tableware, you won’t miss it.

🍽【PROPER WEIGHT AND ERGONOMIC HANDLE】: Unlike other brands, the curvature of our utensil handles is designed according to the posture of the hand, and the appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use that avoids you feel tired. Moreover, the smooth edges ensure safety and no scratches.

🍽【4 STEAK KNIVES INCLUDED】: We have 4 additional steak knives with sharp serrations on the blades, which makes it easy to cut meat and ideal to use for eating. The triple riveting handle is strong and durable even when cut hard, and the ergonomic design makes it very comfortable to hold. Functions as a steak knife and a utility knife. No need to purchase other meat knives else.

🍽【USE AND CARE】: It is recommended to wash by hand, wipe dry before storing. Do not use wire brushes, hard sponges or clean cloths and other hard materials cleaning tools to avoid damage the silverware.【EXCELLENT SERVICE】: We have a very efficient after-sales service team, If you have any questions about our black silverware set, Please feel free to contact us, We will try our best to give you a satisfactory answer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our black silverware set with steak knives is made of high quality food grade stainless steel that ensures safety and durability. They are rust-resistant, sturdy structure and durable for daily use. With simple and elegant design, it’s ideal for family daily use, parties, gatherings, family dinners, candlelight dinner, banquet, Thanksgiving, BBQ, wedding and other formal occasions. Using Instruction: 1.Recommend hand washing for longer term use. 2.Please do not use wire brushes or hard sponges to prevent scratches, keep the silverware smooth. 3.Use mild cleaner when cleaning, taking special care not to soak for long periods as soaking can permanently damage silverware. 4.After cleaning, dry with soft towel and keep them in a dry place.

Comes with 4 steak knives, no need to purchase separately, the blade has sharp serrations, you can cut and slice various steaks and other meats effortlessly. The handle is reinforced by 3 layers of rivets, which is durable, and designed in line with holding posture, making it comfortable and easy to use. These black silverware have proper thickness and uniform weight distribution, so that it has a good balance, which makes it more comfortable to use and not easy to feel fatigued. Also suitable for teenagers and young people. The curvature of our tableware handle is designed according to the posture of the hand, which makes it more comfortable to hold and will not feel tired after long-term use. The smooth edges ensure safety and no scratches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like so much that bought again
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely adore the 24 Pcs Black Silverware Set with Steak Knives! In fact, I loved them so much that I bought two sets, ensuring I have service for 8 for those special occasions or when guests come over.First off, the black finish on this stainless steel flatware set is incredibly sleek and modern. It adds a touch of elegance to my dining table, and the mirror-polished cutlery gleams beautifully under the lights.The set includes everything I need – forks, knives, and spoons, not to mention the bonus steak knives. It's comprehensive and perfect for daily use or entertaining guests. The weight of the utensils feels just right, substantial without being too heavy.What makes these even more fantastic is that they're dishwasher safe. Cleaning up after a meal has never been easier, which is a huge plus in my book. They've held up remarkably well with regular use, showing no signs of wear or rust.In terms of value for money, this set is a winner. You get quality, style, and functionality without breaking the bank. I appreciate the attention to detail in the design and the durability of the materials used.If you're in the market for a reliable and stylish silverware set that can serve a family of four, or even eight if you opt for two sets like I did, then this is an excellent choice. It's truly a delightful addition to my kitchen and dining experience. Bon appétit! 🍴✨

They seem very solid and not easily bent
